borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style=""><span style="line-height: normal;">The siting, depth, scale, and mass of the proposed first floor rear extension would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of outlook and daylight to neighbouring occupiers. </span>As such, the proposed&nbsp;<span style="line-height: normal;">development constitutes&nbsp;unneighbourly development&nbsp;and it&nbsp;</span>is contrary to:​​​​​​​</p><ul><li><span style="line-height:normal">Paragraph 130(f) of the National Planning Policy Framework (DLUHC, July 2021);</span></li><li><span style="line-height:normal">Policy D6 of the London Plan (March 2021);</span></li><li><span style="line-height:normal">Policy CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);</span></li><li><span style="line-height:normal">Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);</span></li><li><span style="line-height:normal">Paragraph 5.3.3 (a) and&nbsp;</span>(<span style="line-height:normal">b) of the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012); and</span></li><li><span style="line-height: normal;">Policies DMD 1 and DMD 6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037 (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021).&nbsp;</span></li></ul>

<p style="">The siting, depth, scale, mass, and design of the proposed<span style="line-height: normal;">&nbsp;first floor rear extension&nbsp;</span>would appear as an incongruous rearwards enlargement to the row of terraced properties. This would be&nbsp;to the detriment of the character and appearance of main dwellinghouse and the surrounding area.&nbsp;​​​​​​​<span style="line-height: normal;"></span>As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<span style="line-height:normal"></span><br></p><ul><li>Paragraphs 126 and 130&nbsp;of the National Planning Policy Framework (DLUHC, July 2021);</li><li>Policies D1 and&nbsp;D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</li><li>Policy CP3 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);</li><li>Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);</li><li>Section 5.3.3 (c) of The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012); and</li><li>Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037(Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021).</li></ul>
description: Construction of a first floor rear extension
